▾
Dictionary Spanish-English

calavera noun, feminine—

skull n

El barco pirata tena una bandera negra con una calavera. — The pirate ship had a black flag with a skull on it.

Examples:

calavera sobre dos tibias cruzadas pl—

skull and crossbones pl
See alternative translations
